text:
I am trying to edit the error messages for my contact form. I’ve followed the guide from the provided link from HubSpot: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options>

I’ve added the code with the correct portalID and formID in a JS file and attached it to the template but does not change the error message.
This is a guess, but I’m wondering if you need to remove the `"` from `portalId` and `formId`
